reference.title: cxxClassTemplateParameterType
reference.shortdesc: The <cxxClassTemplateParameterType> allows you to provide information about the purpose of a template parameter.

section.title: Description
section.p: When instantiating a class template a developer needs to know the role of the template parameter and any constraints on the type used. The <cxxClassTemplateParameterType> element is defined within the <cxxClassTemplateParameter> element. Use it together with the <apiDefNote> sibling element to document how a class template should be used.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxClassTemplateParameters> <cxxClassTemplateParameter> <cxxClassTemplateParameterType>typename T</cxxClassTemplateParameterType> <apiDefNote>The type of the first function object. </apiDefNote> </cxxClassTemplateParameter> <cxxClassTemplateParameter> <cxxClassTemplateParameterType>typename U</cxxClassTemplateParameterType> <apiDefNote>The type of the second function object. </apiDefNote> </cxxClassTemplateParameter> </cxxClassTemplateParameters>
